//======================= About page: UPS has partnered up with Magento to offer a free UPS Shipping and UPS Access Point™ Module that will allow you to integrate and offer a wide range of UPS shipping & delivery solutions directly on your website check-out process! This official UPS Module for Magento gives your customers access to our expansive UPS Access Point network and delivery services.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: UPS ssieħbet ma' Magento biex toffri UPS Shipping u UPS Access Point™ Modulu b'xejn li jippermettilek tintegra u toffri firxa wiesgħa ta' soluzzjonijiet ta' trasport u kunsinna UPS direttament fuq il-proċess ta' check-out tal-websajt tiegħek! Dan il-Modulu UPS uffiċjali għal Magento jagħti lill-klijenti tiegħek aċċess għan-netwerk espansiv tagħna tal-UPS Access Point u s-servizzi tal-kunsinna.

//======================= About page: Simple & easy map interface for your customers to select UPS Access Point as per their preference.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Interfaċċa tal-mappa sempliċi u faċli għall-klijenti tiegħek biex jagħżlu l-UPS Access Point skont il-preferenza tagħhom.

//======================= About page: User-friendly interface for your customers to switch from Access Point delivery to home delivery.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Interfaċċja faċli għall-utent għall-klijenti tiegħek biex jaqilbu mill-kunsinna tal-Punt ta' Aċċess għall-kunsinna tad-dar.

//======================= About page: Real time UPS shipping rate or flat rates for each available service (as per merchant’s back office settings).
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Rata tat-tbaħħir UPS f'ħin reali jew rati fissi għal kull servizz disponibbli (skond is-settings tal-back office tan-negozjant).

//======================= About page: Range of options to set up delivery rates that your customers will see (for example: free shipping, real time shipping rates, or flat rates as per basket value thresholds).
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Firxa ta’ għażliet biex jiġu stabbiliti rati ta’ konsenja li l-klijenti tiegħek se jaraw (pereżempju: tbaħħir b’xejn, rati ta’ tbaħħir f’ħin reali, jew rati fissi skont il-limiti tal-valur tal-basket).

//======================= About page: Possibility to open a UPS account directly in the module itself, if you do not have one.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Possibbiltà li tiftaħ kont UPS direttament fil-modulu innifsu, jekk ma jkollokx wieħed.

//======================= About page: Ability to export open orders so that you can process them in other applications for more complex needs.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Kapaċità li tesporta ordnijiet miftuħa sabiex tkun tista 'tipproċessahom f'applikazzjonijiet oħra għal bżonnijiet aktar kumplessi.

//======================= About page: Module version number and release date
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Numru tal-verżjoni tal-modulu u data tar-rilaxx

//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Naqbel mal-Ftehim dwar it-Teknoloġija tal-UPS u nikkonferma li ngħatajt biżżejjed żmien biex naqrah u nifhem li fih termini importanti dwar l-użu tiegħi tat-Teknoloġiji UPS, bħall-limitazzjoni tar-responsabbiltà tal-UPS u l-qbil tiegħi dwar kif se jkunu t-tilwim bejn UPS u jien. immaniġġjati

//======================= About page: limiting UPS's liability and my agreement on how disputes between UPS and me will be handled

Ma tistax tikseb Terminu u Kundizzjoni

You can find more information on dangerous goods and how UPS can support you shipping them on this link

[https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/help-center/packaging-and-supplies/special -care-shipments/global-dangerous-goods.page]

//======================= About page: A unique six character alphanumeric number that identifies your account. It can be found on the top left side on each page of your UPS invoice
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Numru alfanumeriku uniku ta' sitt karattri li jidentifika l-kont tiegħek. Tista' tinstab fuq in-naħa ta' fuq tax-xellug fuq kull paġna tal-fattura tal-UPS tiegħek

//======================= About page: A unique 12 digit number assigned by UPS to an invoice. It can be found on the top left side on each page of your UPS invoice
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Numru uniku bi 12-il ċifra assenjat minn UPS lil fattura. Tista' tinstab fuq in-naħa ta' fuq tax-xellug fuq kull paġna tal-fattura tal-UPS tiegħek

//======================= About page: Total Amount Due for the given invoice. It can be found on the 'Summary of Charges' table on the first page on the invoice
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ammont Totali dovut għall-fattura mogħtija. Tista' ssibha fuq it-tabella 'Sommarju tal-Ħlasijiet' fl-ewwel paġna fuq il-fattura

//======================= About page: Date of issuing the invoice. It can be found on the top left side on each page of your UPS invoice
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Data tal-ħruġ tal-fattura. Tista' tinstab fuq in-naħa ta' fuq tax-xellug fuq kull paġna tal-fattura tal-UPS tiegħek

//======================= About page: Some of the data you entered is not valid. Please check again.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Xi wħud mid-dejta li daħħalt mhix valida. Jekk jogħġbok iċċekkja mill-ġdid.
Ma tistax toħloq Numru tal-Kont ġdid

//======================= About page: Please update the city and postal code values with one of these selections and click Get Started

//======================= About page: Please enter the address attached to your account number
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk jogħġbok daħħal l-indirizz mehmuż man-numru tal-kont tiegħek

//======================= Dwar il-paġna: In-numru tal-kont diġà jeżisti fil-'Kont tal-Ħlas Tiegħek'

//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Dan il-kont se jitneħħa. Ikklikkja Ok biex tikkonferma, agħlaq id-djalogu biex tikkanċella.

//======================= About page: Your UPS account has been successfull registered
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Il-kont UPS tiegħek ġie rreġistrat b'suċċess

//======================= About page: Select the UPS services you want to be visible in the checkout for your e-shoppers. To learn more about UPS services, refer UPS Tariff/Terms and Conditions of Service on UPS.COM
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Agħżel is-servizzi tal-UPS li trid tkun viżibbli fil-checkout għall-e-shoppers tiegħek. Biex titgħallem aktar dwar is-servizzi tal-UPS, irreferi Tariffa/Termini u Kundizzjonijiet tas-Servizz tal-UPS fuq UPS.COM

//======================= About page: Deliver to UPS Access Point™ (to-AP delivery)
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ibgħat f'post tal-UPS Access Point™ (kunsinna lill-AP)

//======================= About page: UPS delivers the parcel to a UPS Access Point™ that the customer selected, then customer picks up their order there
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: UPS twassal il-pakkett f'post tal-UPS Access Point™ magħżul mill-klijent biex jiġborhom fil-konvenjenza tiegħu

//======================= About page: Select the shipping services for your customers to choose
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Agħżel is-servizzi tat-tbaħħir għall-klijenti tiegħek biex jagħżlu

//======================= About page: International shipping only - visible, when shipping address is outside of EU
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Tbaħħir internazzjonali biss - viżibbli, meta l-indirizz tat-tbaħħir ikun barra mill-UE
Issettjar tal-wiri tal-Punt ta' Aċċess tal-UPS:

//======================= About page: Number of Access Points visible to customers:
Display all the Access Points in range of:
Choose Account Number for this option
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Agħżel Numru tal-Kont għal din l-għażla

//======================= About page: UPS delivers the parcel to the shipping address provided by customer.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: UPS iwassal il-pakkett fl-indirizz tat-tbaħħir ipprovdut mill-klijent.

//======================= About page: The cut off time selected here will be used in calculating the schedule delivery date and time, which will be displayed on your website checkout.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Il-ħin tal-qtugħ magħżul hawnhekk se jintuża fil-kalkolu tad-data u l-ħin tal-kunsinna tal-iskeda, li se jintwerew fuq il-kontroll tal-websajt tiegħek.

//======================= About page: For example, if the cut off time is selected as 5 PM and your e-shoppers views your webstore at 5.01 PM, all UPS scheduled delivery dates and time will be calculated from the following business day. When deciding this cut off time, please ensure that you have sufficient time to fulfill the order before the UPS scheduled pick up or you are able to drop off the packages at a UPS Access Point™.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Pereżempju, jekk il-ħin tal-qtugħ jintgħażel bħala 5 PM u l-e-shoppers tiegħek jaraw il-ħanut tal-web tiegħek fil-5:01 PM, id-dati u l-ħin tal-kunsinna skedati kollha tal-UPS jiġu kkalkulati mill-jum ta' negozju ta' wara. Meta tiddeċiedi dan il-ħin ta' qtugħ, jekk jogħġbok kun żgur li għandek żmien biżżejjed biex twettaq l-ordni qabel il-ġbir skedat tal-UPS jew tkun tista' twaqqa' l-pakketti f'post tal-UPS Access Point™.

//======================= About page: If you are unsure about fulfilling customer orders on the same day, you can select 'Disable' which will result in the e-shopper seeing a generic delivery schedule for each available UPS service. For Example; 'UPS® Standard - In most cases, delivered within 1 to 3 business days in Europe.'
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk m'intix ċert dwar it-twettiq ta' l-ordnijiet tal-klijenti fl-istess jum, tista' tagħżel 'Iżżarma' li tirriżulta f'li l-e-shopper jara d-dati ta' kunsinna approssimattivi għal kull servizz disponibbli.

//======================= About page: Please select at least one shipping service.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk jogħġbok agħżel mill-inqas servizz tat-tbaħħir wieħed.

//======================= About page: You have the official Magento COD module enabled!
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Għandek il-modulu COD uffiċjali ta' Magento attivat!

//======================= About page: Only show Access Points supporting COD shipments?
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Uri biss il-Punti ta' Aċċess li jappoġġaw il-vjeġġi COD?

//======================= About page: Select 'YES' if you plan to offer COD shipments to a UPS Access Point™
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Agħżel 'IVA' jekk qed tippjana li toffri vjeġġi COD lil UPS Access Point™

//======================= About page: The COD Shipping service of this plug-in is automatically compatible with the official Collect on Delivery (COD) module by Magento.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Is-servizz COD Shipping ta’ dan il-plug-in huwa awtomatikament kompatibbli mal-modulu uffiċjali Collect on Delivery (COD) minn Magento.

//======================= About page: You do not have the official Magento COD module installed and/or enabled!
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: M'għandekx il-modulu COD uffiċjali ta' Magento installat u/jew attivat!

//======================= About page: The COD Shipping service of this plugin is automatically compatible with the official Cash on Delivery (COD) module by Magento.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Is-servizz COD Shipping ta 'dan il-plugin huwa awtomatikament kompatibbli mal-modulu uffiċjali Cash on Delivery (COD) minn Magento.

//======================= About page: If you want the UPS Shipping module to automatically detect COD shipments, please make sure that you have installed Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD). If you already have Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD) module installed, please make sure that the module is enabled. [Click here] for detailed guidance.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk trid li l-modulu UPS Shipping awtomatikament jiskopri vjeġġi COD,jekk jogħġbok kun żgur li installajt Magento's Collect on Delivery (COD). Jekk diġà għandek il-modulu Collect on Delivery (COD) ta' Magento installat,jekk jogħġbok kun żgur li l-modulu huwa attivat. [Ikklikkja hawn] għal gwida dettaljata.

//======================= About page: Please enter weight and dimensions of your packaging here. You can add multiple package dimensions, which can be easily selected in a dropdown option when creating shipments in the plug-in.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk jogħġbok daħħal il-piż u d-dimensjonijiet tal-ippakkjar tiegħek hawn. Tista 'żżid dimensjonijiet multipli tal-pakkett, li jistgħu jintgħażlu faċilment f'għażla dropdown meta toħloq vjeġġi fil-plug-in.

//======================= About page: In case you decide to show the real time UPS shipping rate (to be configured in the next screen) to the e-shoppers, the plug-in will use the first package, referred to as the 'Default Package' that is displayed below. The Default Package's weight and dimensions will be used to calculate the UPS shipping rates that will be displayed to the e-shoppers.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: F'każ li tiddeċiedi li turi r-rata tat-tbaħħir tal-UPS f'ħin reali (li trid tiġi kkonfigurata fl-iskrin li jmiss) lill-e-shoppers, il-plug-in juża l-ewwel pakkett, imsejjaħ il-'Pakkett Default' li jidher hawn taħt. Il-piż u d-dimensjonijiet tal-Pakkett Default se jintużaw biex jiġu kkalkulati r-rati tat-tbaħħir UPS li se jintwerew lill-e-shoppers.

//======================= About page: Example: Standard, Large, Phone box, etc.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Eżempju: Standard, Kbir, Kaxxa tat-telefown, eċċ.

//======================= About page: You are going to remove this default package from your profile. Click Ok to confirm, close the dialog to cancel.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Int se tneħħi dan il-pakkett default mill-profil tiegħek. Ikklikkja Ok biex tikkonferma, agħlaq id-djalogu biex tikkanċella.

//======================= About page: Please input at least one default package to continue.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk jogħġbok daħħal mill-inqas pakkett wieħed default biex tkompli.

//======================= About page: Basic (number of items in the e-shopper order determine the package size)
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Bażiku (in-numru ta 'oġġetti fl-ordni ta' e-shopper jiddetermina d-daqs tal-pakkett)

//======================= About page: Advanced (weights and dimensions of products in the e-shopper order determine the package size)
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Avvanzat (il-piżijiet u d-dimensjonijiet tal-prodotti fl-ordni tal-e-shopper jiddeterminaw id-daqs tal-pakkett)

//======================= About page: Note: the plugin will create a custom package size if an e-shopper order is larger than the packages you enter
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Nota: il-plugin se joħloq daqs ta' pakkett apposta jekk ordni ta' e-shopper tkun akbar mill-pakketti li ddaħħal

//======================= About page: Warning! To use this option you must enter product weights in the product settings of your shop.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Twissija! Biex tuża din l-għażla trid iddaħħal il-piżijiet tal-prodotti fis-settings tal-prodott tal-ħanut tiegħek.

//======================= About page: If set to “No”, rates will be based on product weights only.  If set to “Yes”, product dimensions must be entered in the product settings of your shop
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk issettjati għal "Le", ir-rati se jkunu bbażati fuq il-piżijiet tal-prodott biss.  Jekk issettjat għal "Iva", id-dimensjonijiet tal-prodott għandhom jiddaħħlu fis-settings tal-prodott tal-ħanut tiegħek

//======================= About page: Backup rate will only display to e-shoppers if there is an issue within product settings, such as weights missing or if weights/dimensions exceed UPS limits
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ir-Rata tal-Backup se turi biss lil xerrejja elettroniċi jekk ikun hemm kwistjoni fl-issettjar tal-prodott, bħal piżijiet neqsin jew jekk piżijiet/dimensjonijiet jaqbżu l-limiti tal-UPS

//======================= About page: Add default packages if you would like the package size used for rating to change based on the number of items in the e-shopper’s order
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Żid pakketti awtomatiċi jekk tixtieq li d-daqs tal-pakkett użat għall-klassifikazzjoni jinbidel skont in-numru ta’ oġġetti fl-ordni tal-e-shopper

//======================= About page: Note: if the number of items in the e-shopper order do not match any of your entries, then the size of the package used for rating will be based on that of the highest item count exceeded by the e-shopper order.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Nota: jekk in-numru ta 'oġġetti fl-ordni ta' e-shopper ma jaqbilx ma 'ebda waħda mill-entrati tiegħek, allura d-daqs tal-pakkett użat għall-klassifikazzjoni jkun ibbażat fuq dak tal-ogħla għadd ta' oġġetti maqbuż mill-ordni ta 'e-shopper.
Vapur lejn il-post tal-UPS Access Point™

//======================= About page: The e-shopper will see the % of real time UPS rates. These rates are calculated using the default package weight and dimensions that you configured in the previous screen (Package Dimensions).
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: L-e-shopper se jara l-% tar-rati tal-UPS f'ħin reali. Dawn ir-rati huma kkalkulati bl-użu tal-piż u d-dimensjonijiet default tal-pakkett li kkonfigurajt fl-iskrin preċedenti (Dimensjonijiet tal-Pakkett).

//======================= About page: The minimum thresholds can not be the same.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Il-limiti minimi ma jistgħux ikunu l-istess.

//======================= About page: Click on the 'Complete Configuration' button to finish the configuration of the plug-in and start offering UPS shipping services on your website.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ikklikkja fuq il-buttuna 'Konfigurazzjoni Kompleta' biex tlesti l-konfigurazzjoni tal-plug-in u tibda toffri servizzi tat-tbaħħir UPS fuq il-websajt tiegħek.

//======================= About page: If you are new to UPS, please refer to the following FAQs for additional information:
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk int ġdid għall-UPS, jekk jogħġbok irreferi għall-FAQs li ġejjin għal informazzjoni addizzjonali:

//======================= About page:
1) How do I get more information about my new UPS shipping account?
If you opened a new UPS shipping account from the plug-in, a confirmation email with more information will be sent to the email address that you entered while creating the new account.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
1) Kif nista 'nikseb aktar informazzjoni dwar il-kont il-ġdid tiegħi tat-tbaħħir UPS?
Jekk ftaħt kont ġdid tat-tbaħħir UPS mill-plug-in, tintbagħat email ta' konferma b'aktar informazzjoni fl-indirizz elettroniku li daħħalt waqt toħloq il-kont il-ġdid.

//======================= About page:
2) How do I prepare my packages for UPS collection or drop off to a UPS Access Point™?
Refer to the package preparation recommendations at this link - https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/services/individual-shipper/preparing-to-ship.page
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
2. Kif nipprepara l-pakketti tiegħi għall-ġbir tal-UPS jew niżel f'post tal-UPS Access Point™?
Irreferi għar-rakkomandazzjonijiet tal-preparazzjoni tal-pakketti f'din il-link - https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/services/individual-shipper/preparing -to-ship.page

//======================= About page:
3) How do I give my packages to UPS?
You can drop you packages at any authorized UPS location such as a UPS Access Point™. Click below to search for a convenient access point location near you.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
3. Kif nagħti l-pakketti tiegħi lil UPS?
Tista' twaqqa' l-pakkett tiegħek fi kwalunkwe post awtorizzat tal-UPS bħal post tal-UPS Access Point™. Ikklikkja hawn taħt biex tfittex post konvenjenti ħdejk

//======================= About page: You can also ask UPS to pickup packages from your warehouse or business address. If you need an occasional pickup, you can directly schedule a pickup from UPS.COM using this link - https://wwwapps.ups.com/pickup/schedule?loc=%1
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Tista' wkoll titlob lill-UPS biex tiġbor pakketti mill-maħżen jew mill-indirizz tan-negozju tiegħek. Jekk għandek bżonn pickup okkażjonali, tista' tiskeda direttament pickup minn UPS.COM billi tuża din il-link - https://wwwapps.ups.com/pickup/schedule?loc=%1

//======================= About page: If you have UPS packages on most business days and would prefer a regular UPS pickup, you can email a completed and signed Pickup form to the following email address - konto@ups.com. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss a daily UPS pickup.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk għandek pakketti UPS fil-biċċa l-kbira tal-ġranet tax-xogħol u tippreferi pickup regolari tal-UPS, tista’ tikkuntattja lill-UPS billi ċċempel fuq in-numru tat-telefon ipprovdut taħt Mistoqsijiet dwar il-Billing hawn. Imbagħad rappreżentant tal-UPS ikun f'kuntatt miegħek biex jiddiskuti pickup tal-UPS ta' kuljum.

//======================= About page: If you have UPS packages on most business days and would prefer a regular UPS pickup, you can contact UPS by calling at the phone number provided under Billing Questions here. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss a daily UPS pickup.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk għandek pakketti UPS fil-biċċa l-kbira tal-ġranet tax-xogħol u tippreferi pickup regolari tal-UPS, jekk jogħġbok irreferi għal din il-link għal struzzjonijiet dwar l-iskedar ta' pickups ta' kuljum: https://www.ups.com/us/en/shipping/services/value-added/daily-pickup.page

//======================= About page:
4. What steps do I need to take to set up a UPS Collect on Delivery (COD) service?
You can contact UPS by calling at the phone number provided under Billing Questions here. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss the COD service.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
4. X'passi għandi nieħu biex inwaqqaf servizz ta' UPS Collect on Delivery (COD)?
Tista' tikkuntattja lill-UPS billi ċċempel fuq in-numru tat-telefon ipprovdut taħt Mistoqsijiet dwar Billing hawn. Imbagħad rappreżentant tal-UPS ikun f'kuntatt miegħek biex jiddiskuti s-servizz COD.

//======================= About page:
4) What steps do I need to take to set up a UPS Collect on Delivery (COD) service?
You can email a completed and signed COD form to the following email address - konto@ups.com. Then a UPS representative will be in touch with you to discuss the COD service.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
4. X'passi għandi nieħu biex inwaqqaf servizz ta' UPS Collect on Delivery (COD)?
Jekk int interessat li tuża s-servizzi ta' UPS Collect on Delivery (COD), jekk jogħġbok irreferi għal din il-link għad-dettalji: < a href='https://www.ups.com/%1/%2/shipping/services/value-added/cod.page' target='_blank'>https://www.ups.com/%1 /%2/shipping/services/value-added/cod.page

Your package will be delivered to an UPS Access Point<sup>TM</sup>

Delivered by End of Business Day

Linja ta' l-indirizz, Belt, Stat, Kodiċi Postali

//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Il-kodiċi postali huwa vojt jew invalidu

//======================= About page: NOTICE: The UPS package tracking systems accessed via this service (the " Tracking Systems ") and tracking information obtained through this service (the " Information ") is the private property of UPS. UPS authorizes you to use the Tracking Systems solely to track shipments tendered by or for you to UPS for delivery and for no other purpose. Without limitation, you are not authorized to make the Information available on any web site or otherwise reproduce, distribute, copy, store, use or sell the Information for commercial gain without the express written consent of UPS. This is a personal service, thus your right to use the Tracking Systems or Information is non-assignable. Any access or use that is inconsistent with these terms is unauthorized and strictly prohibited.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: AVVIŻ: Is-sistemi ta 'traċċar tal-pakketti UPS aċċessati permezz ta' dan is-servizz (il-"Sistemi ta 'Traċċar") u l-informazzjoni ta' traċċar miksuba permezz ta 'dan is-servizz (l-"Informazzjoni") hija l-proprjetà privata ta' UPS. UPS tawtorizzak tuża s-Sistemi ta' Traċċar biss biex issegwi vjeġġi offerti minn jew għalik lil UPS għall-kunsinna u għall-ebda skop ieħor. Mingħajr limitazzjoni, m'intix awtorizzat li tagħmel l-Informazzjoni disponibbli fuq kwalunkwe websajt jew inkella tirriproduċi, tqassam, tikkopja, taħżen, tuża jew tbigħ l-Informazzjoni għal gwadann kummerċjali mingħajr il-kunsens espress bil-miktub ta' UPS. Dan huwa servizz personali, għalhekk id-dritt tiegħek li tuża s-Sistemi ta' Traċċar jew l-Informazzjoni mhuwiex assenjat. Kwalunkwe aċċess jew użu li huwa inkonsistenti ma 'dawn it-termini huwa mhux awtorizzat u strettament ipprojbit.

Issettjar tal-wiri tal-Punt ta' Aċċess tal-UPS:

//======================= About page: Number of Access Points visible to customers:
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Numru ta' Punti ta' Aċċess viżibbli għall-klijenti:

//======================= About page: Display all the Access Points in range of:
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Uri l-Punti ta’ Aċċess kollha f’firxa ta’:

//======================= About page: If you are new to UPS, please refer to the following FAQs for additional information:
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jekk int ġdid għall-UPS, jekk jogħġbok irreferi għall-FAQs li ġejjin għal informazzjoni addizzjonali:

//======================= About page: By installing UPS Plugin you gained this convenient option to apply UPS recommended Security Enhancements to your e-shop.By enabling particular security enhancements below you can make your e-shop less vulnerable to some common hackers' attacks.

Note, you can keep UPS recommended Security Enhancements disabled if you have already implemented these security measures in other way (by tweaking your web servers configurations properly, by coding own Magento hooks or by using some other plugin that aims to implement the similar enhancements).
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Billi installajt UPS Plugin ksibt din l-għażla konvenjenti biex tapplika Titjib tas-Sigurtà rakkomandat mill-UPS għall-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek. Billi tippermetti titjib partikolari tas-sigurtà hawn taħt tista' tagħmel il-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek inqas vulnerabbli għal attakki ta' xi hackers komuni.

//======================= About page: Note, you can keep UPS recommended Security Enhancements disabled if you have already implemented these security measures in other way (by tweaking your web servers configurations properly, by coding own Magento hooks or by using some other plugin that aims to implement the similar enhancements).

See [wikipedia|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clickjacking] for more details. If you enable this defense, then UPS plugin will secure your store by communicating framing policy to user's browser through 'X-Frame-Options: Sameorigin' HTTP response header and by injecting 'frame-breaker' java script for legacy browsers.- UPS Plugin can secure your e-shop Front Office pages in accordance with OWASP recommended Clickjacking Defense Cheat Sheet Disable this defense if you wish to enable framing of your e-shop GUI on 3rd party websites; or if you have already implemented this defense differently.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ara [wikipedia|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clickjacking] għal aktar dettalji. Jekk tippermetti din id-difiża, allura l-plugin UPS jiżgura l-maħżen tiegħek billi jikkomunika l-politika tal-qafas lill-browser tal-utent permezz tal-header tar-rispons HTTP 'X-Frame-Options: Sameorigin' u billi jinjetta script java 'frame-breaker' għal browsers legacy.- UPS Plugin jista' jiżgura l-paġni tal-Front Office tal-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek skont il-Clickjacking Defense Cheat Sheet rakkomandat mill-OWASP Iddiżattiva din id-difiża jekk tixtieq li tippermetti l-iffissar tal-GUI tal-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek fuq websajts ta' partijiet terzi; jew jekk diġà implimentajt din id-difiża b'mod differenti.

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details.If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
Ara l-wikipedia għal aktar dettalji. Jekk tiċċekkja din l-għażla, il-plugin UPS se jassigura l-Front Office tal-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek billi japplika
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff

//======================= About page: HTTP Response Header to all Magento Front Office pages. That will prevent the client's browser (notably Internet Explorer) from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type. You may not really need this as your users are not supposed to upload any potentially harmful files to your e-shop (e.g. JavaScript instead of an Image). However, it is still good practice to enable this special security header as there is no performance penalty associated with it.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Header ta' Rispons HTTP għall-paġni kollha tal-Front Office ta' Magento. Dan se jipprevjeni lill-browser tal-klijent (b'mod partikolari l-Internet Explorer) milli jxamm rispons minn MIME mit-tip ta' kontenut iddikjarat. Jista' jkun li ma jkollokx bżonnha tassew peress li l-utenti tiegħek m'għandhomx itellgħu fajls potenzjalment ta' ħsara fil-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek (eż. JavaScript minflok Immaġni). Madankollu, għadha prattika tajba li din l-intestatura tas-sigurtà speċjali tiġi attivata peress li m'hemm l-ebda penali tal-prestazzjoni assoċjata magħha.

//======================= About page: Enables cross-site scripting filters in browsers that support the X-XSS-Protection directive
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Jippermetti filtri cross-site scripting fil-browsers li jappoġġjaw id-direttiva X-XSS-Protection

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details.If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
X-XSS-Protection: '1; mode=block'
HTTP response header to all Magento Front Office pages.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
Ara l-wikipedia għal aktar dettalji. Jekk tiċċekkja din l-għażla, il-plugin UPS se jassigura l-Front Office tal-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek billi japplika
X-XSS-Protection: '1; mode=block'
Heater tar-rispons HTTP għall-paġni kollha tal-Front Office ta' Magento.

//======================= About page: Protect your e-shop website against protocol downgrade attacks and cookie hijacking
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ipproteġi l-websajt tal-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek kontra attakki ta' downgrade tal-protokoll u ħtif tal-cookies

//======================= About page:
See wikipedia for more details If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure your e-shop Front Office by applying
Strict-Transport-Security 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains'
HTTP response header to all Magento Front Office pages.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
Ara l-wikipedia għal aktar dettalji Jekk tiċċekkja din l-għażla, il-plugin UPS se jassigura l-Front Office tal-ħanut elettroniku tiegħek billi japplika
Strict-Transport-Security 'max-age=31536000; include SubDomains'
Heater ta' rispons HTTP għall-paġni kollha tal-Front Office ta' Magento.

//======================= About page: Prevent sensitive pages from caching by browser.
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Ipprevjeni li paġni sensittivi jdaħħlu fil-caching bil-browser.

//======================= About page:
See OWASP FAQs for more details. If you check this option, UPS plugin will secure the Checkout process by applying
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
HTTP response headers to the corresponding pages
//======================= Dwar il-paġna:
Ara l-FAQs tal-OWASP għal aktar dettalji. Jekk tiċċekkja din l-għażla, il-plugin UPS jiżgura l-proċess tal-Checkout billi japplika
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store
Jiskadi: 0
Pragma: no-cache
Intestaturi tar-rispons HTTP għall-paġni korrispondenti

//======================= Dwar il-paġna: M'hemm l-ebda servizz tat-tbaħħir għall-indirizz ta 'hawn fuq

//======================= Dwar il-paġna: M'għandekx tikketta għal din l-ID tat-Traċċar

//======================= About page: We are unable to void this shipment at this time. You may attempt to void the shipment later. However you will not be billed for this shipment provided that you do not use the shipping label
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: F'dan il-ħin ma nistgħux inħallu din il-vjeġġ. Tista' tipprova tħassar il-vjeġġ aktar tard. Madankollu inti mhux se tiġi ffatturat għal din il-konsenja sakemm ma tużax it-tikketta tat-tbaħħir

//======================= About page: Error! Package exceeds the maximum allowable size of 400 cm or 157.48 inches (the maximum allowable size calculation = length + 2 * width + 2 * height).
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Żball! Il-pakkett jaqbeż id-daqs massimu permissibbli ta '400 ċm jew 157.48 pulzier (il-kalkolu tad-daqs massimu permess = tul + 2 * wisa' + 2 * għoli).

//======================= About page: Access Points Address will be used as an alternative shipping address
//======================= Dwar il-paġna: Indirizz tal-Punti ta' Aċċess se jintuża bħala indirizz tat-tbaħħir alternattiv
